content: stay cozy and stylish with the classic cables earwarmer featuring beautiful cable stitching and a large flower applique it s the perfect mix of warmth and charm made with worsted weight yarn it s great for chilly days and adds a touch of flair to any outfit -------------------------- you will receive -------------------------- 1 pdf digital download file for classic cables earwarmer crochet pattern instant download as soon as payment clears ravelry s system written in english and u s crochet terms ---------------- yarn used ---------------- worsted weight yarn #4 ------------------------------ sizes head circumference ------------------------------ baby 16 /40 5cm toddler 18 /45 5cm child 20 /51cm small adult 22 /56cm large adult 23 /58 5cm ----------------- skill level ----------------- easy ---------- notes ---------- ~gauge is included in this pattern ~this pattern has been checked for accuracy although this has been tested please note that small errors can still slip by i am happy to assist if you need any help ~this is a free pattern on my blog but you can also purchase this listing for the ad-free downloadable pdf version ----------------------- downloading ----------------------- ~download instructions~ go to my notebook and find the pattern image for this purchase and a download link will accompany it i cannot email patterns to you ------------------------ where to print ------------------------ ~ home printer ~ local copy store - for example staples office depot etc ~ local professional printer ~ online print vendor --------------------- terms of use --------------------- ©2014 ©2025 sonya blackstone do not sell share or modify this pattern you may sell items you make with this pattern this pattern as with all blackstone designs/sonya blackstone patterns are not for educational use without written permission from the designer online users please link to me when sharing your creations all rights reserved www facebook com/sblackstonedesigns www instagram com/blackstone_designs ------------------------ all sales final ------------------------ due to the nature of digital files they cannot be returned so no exchanges or refunds will be given ------------------------------- ravelry shop coupons ------------------------------- purchase any 3 single patterns & receive 20% off use coupon code save20now purchase any 4 single patterns & receive 25% off use coupon code save25now purchase any 5 single patterns & receive 30% off use coupon code save30now thank you for visiting
